name: rimfrost-api-express-ts
description: A small, well-structured **Express + TypeScript** REST API for the **Rimfrost** domain using **Prisma ORM** and **MySQL**.   The project follows a **layer-first architecture** for clear separation of concerns:

scripts.db:migrate: mysql -u root -p rimfrost_db < db/migrations/002_base_data_roles_formats.sql && mysql -u root -p rimfrost_db < db/migrations/003_seed_people_records_songs.sql
scripts.db:seed: mysql -u root -p rimfrost_db < db/migrations/004_relations_release_credit.sql && mysql -u root -p rimfrost_db < db/migrations/005_relations_song_writer.sql && mysql -u root -p rimfrost_db < db/migrations/006_seed_track_list.sql && mysql -u root -p rimfrost_db < db/migrations/007_seed_editions.sql
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:reset && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
